GSP33yasasi_u:8: īṣṭe viśvasya nityaṃ vyapagatatulanāyogyavastvantaro yo vidye yasyādhigatyai vidurupaniṣado dve parāṃ cāparāṃ ca /
GSP33yasasi_u:9: yo viśvasvāntavāsī prathayati ca dhiyaṃ tasya tasyānurūpāṃ devaḥ śrīmān sa mahyaṃ pradiśatu dayayā dhīvikāsaṃ samantāt // 1 //
GSP33yasasi_u:17_0: advaitino hisadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyamiti kāraṇībhūtasya sacchabditasya
GSP33yasasi_u:22: yadvā uttarārdhe tacchadbaḥ prasiddhaparāmarśī na tu yacchabdanirdiṣṭapratinirdeśarūpaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:33: anyatve sadṛśatve vā dvitīyaṃ sidhyati dhruvam // 4 //
GSP33yasasi_u:34: advitīyapadasya tatpuruṣavṛttatve na dvitīyasya bādha ityāhapūrvasmin ityādinā ślokacatuṣṭayena /
GSP33yasasi_u:35: tatpuruṣa iti prathamakalpe tāvaduttarapadārthaḥ prādhānyena vivakṣyate,
GSP33yasasi_u:39: nañtatpuruṣe cāropitatvasya pūrvapadārthatvaṃ tasya cottarapadārthaviśeṣaṇatvamiṣyate śābdikaiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:42: nañivayuktamanyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tathā hyarthagatiriti ca śābdikānāṃ paribhāṣā /
GSP33yasasi_u:43: tathā cādvitīyapadenāropitadvitīyatvavadbrahmeti bodhe tatra dvitīyānyatvasya dvitīyasadṛśatvasya dvitīyaviruddhatvasya vā pratītiḥ phalati /
GSP33yasasi_u:45: dvitīyapratiyogikasya bhedasya sādṛśyasya vā pratibodhane pratiyogitayā dvitīyasiddherniṣpratyūhatvāditi bhāvaḥ // 3 //4 //
GSP33yasasi_u:46: viruddhatve dvitīyena tṛtīyaṃ prathamaṃ tu vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:48: nanvevamapi dvitīyaviruddhatve brahmaṇo bodhite kathaṃ na dvitīyasya bādha ityatrāhaviruddhatvaiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:51: sa ca dharmaḥ prathamatvaṃ niyamataḥ tṛtīyatvādi vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:71: tato 'nyattadviruddhaṃ vā sadṛśaṃ vātra vakti saḥ // 8 //
GSP33yasasi_u:96: viśeṣaṇe vā tadbrahma tṛtīyaṃ prathamaṃ tu vā // 11 //
GSP33yasasi_u:106: tṛtīyaṃ tadabhāvatvaviśeṣaṇamiti prathamatvaṃ tṛtīyatvaṃ vā brahmaṇo 'varjanīyamityuttarārdhārthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:109: brahmaṇaḥ prathamā ye ca tṛtīyādyā jagatrtraye // 12 //
GSP33yasasi_u:111: kiñca tatra bahuvrīhau samāse saṃśrite sati // 13 //
GSP33yasasi_u:117: nāsti dvitīyaṃ yasya tadbrahmetyatra pakṣe vigrahaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:119: tathā ca brahmaṇa eva dvitīyatvaṃ labhyeta /
GSP33yasasi_u:120: tataśca brahmāpekṣayā prathamasya tṛtīyādeśca na bādho 'dvitīyaśrutyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:121: ādyasaṅkhyāpūrakatvaṃ prathamatvam , tritvādisaṅkhyāpūrakatvaṃ ca tṛtīyatvādīti bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:126: dvitve ca yacchabdārthasya brahmaṇo niṣṭhatvasaṃbandhonānvayo nopeyate;
GSP33yasasi_u:130: yato brahmaṇo bhinnaṃ nāsti tadbrahmādvitīyamiti dvitīyabādho 'dvitīyaśrutyā labhyata evetyatrāhakiñceti /
GSP33yasasi_u:137: yasyeti ṣaṣṭhī prakṛtyarthānviter'thāntarasaṃbandhe prāmāṇike sati saṅgacchate /
GSP33yasasi_u:138: nirviśeṣe ca brahmaṇi prakṛtyarthe padārthāntarasaṃbandhasyāsatyatvāt ṣaṣṭhībahuvrīhiśca prakṛte na ghaṭata ityarthaḥ // 12 //13 //14 //
GSP33yasasi_u:141: rāhoḥ śira ityādāvabhede 'pi ṣaṣṭhyā dṛṣṭeryadabhinno dvitīyābhāvastadadvitīyaṃ brahmeti vivakṣāṃ pratikṣepati,dvitīyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:142: asataḥ satpadārthābhedastadviśeṣaṇatvamapi na yujyate iti bhāvaḥ // 15 //
GSP33yasasi_u:148: ( ityadvitīyaśruteḥ parābhimatārthe dūṣaṇanirūpaṇam ) tenādvitīyaṃ brahmeti śruterartho 'yamucyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:164: prathamato brahmaṇo gaṇane kṛte tena saha gaṇanārhe dvitīyaḥ samo vādhiko vā padārthaḥ kālatraye 'pi nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:165: nanu vividhavicitrānantacidacitprapañce kathaṃ kasyacidapi brahmasamasyābhāvaḥ ? tatrāhayataiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:170: tathā cānugṛhītaṃ śatadūṣaṇyāṃ śrīmadvedāntadeśikacaraṇaiḥasmatpakṣe tu vṛttidvayamapi samyak /
GSP33yasasi_u:176: mukhyasyaiva prathamaparigaṇanasya loke śāstre ca dṛṣṭeḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:177: kavikulagaṇanāprasaṅge kālidāsasyaiva hi prāthamyena gaṇanaṃ kavilokaprasiddham /
GSP33yasasi_u:184: samasyaiva dvitīyagaṇanāyogyatvamityāśayamūlakaṃ capurā kavīnāmitiślokasyottarārdhaṃ paripaṭhyate adyāpi tattulyakaverabhāvādanāmikā sār'thavatī babhūvaiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:185: tathā ca bahuvrīhivṛttyā samaniṣedhaḥ phalati brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:186: muktānāmapi bhogamātrasāmyamiti na brahmaṇā saha gaṇanaṃ mukhyaparigaṇanaprastāve yuktam /
GSP33yasasi_u:187: tanmukhyaṃ vastu vastuto brahmaikameveti advitīyatvaṃ tasya pratitiṣṭhatīti ca bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:189_0: na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśca dṛśyate iti śrutyantarānusārātna tvatsamo 'styabhyadhikaḥ
GSP33yasasi_u:189_1: kuto 'nyo lokatraye 'pyapratimaprabhāva ityupabṛṃhaṇānusārāccaidamarthyameva tasya nyāyyamiti hārdam /
GSP33yasasi_u:191: colanṛpasyāsthānapaṇḍitaṃ vijityavādāhaverājāsanaṃ rājyārdhaṃ ca tatsamarpitamadhigatavanta ime paramācāryāḥ pūrvāśrame /
GSP33yasasi_u:198: tā veṣṇavamahāvibhūtyarṇavaviśīryamāṇa jalakaṇikāyamānāḥ tadadvitīyatvaśrutyā na bādhyanta iti yāvat /
GSP33yasasi_u:199: aupaniṣadaṃ paraṃ tattvaṃ paraṃ brahma śrīmannārāyaṇa eveti ca viṣṇoriti nirdeśena jñāpitam // 17 //18 //19 //20 //21 //22 //
GSP33yasasi_u:202: yathaika eva savitā na dvitīyo nabhaḥsthale /
GSP33yasasi_u:203: ityuktā na hi sāvitrā niṣidhyante 'tra raśmayaḥ // 24 //
GSP33yasasi_u:207: tatsvarūpāntargatasya tena saha gaṇanāyoga ityatredaṃ nidarśanam , savitṛnidarśanaṃ ca /
GSP33yasasi_u:208: guṇasya guṇinā saha gaṇanāyoga ityatrayathā pradhāneti /
GSP33yasasi_u:213: saṅkhyeyadravyagaṇanāyāṃ saṅkhyeyo 'nyaḥ padārtho yathā gaṇyate na tathā tadguṇabhūtā saṅkhyā tena saha gaṇyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:216: tathā, pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi /
GSP33yasasi_u:218: nanu sarvaṃ tadā śobhanam ; yadi brahmavibhūtitvādau pramāṇaṃ syādityatrāhatatheti /
GSP33yasasi_u:220: yathā brahmaguṇatvaṃ sidhyejjagataḥ tathaiva brahmāṃśatvaṃ pratipādayacchrutijātaṃ sarvaṃ jagata brahmāpṛthaksiddhaprakāratve vyavārthāpayadityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:224: tathā, etāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyastaro hi saḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:231: mahimā ityanena jagato vibhūtitvaṃ brahmaṇo 'tiśayāvahatvādguṇatvaṃ ca jñāyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:232: tato jyāyāṃśca pūruṣa iti brahmaṇo jagadapekṣayātivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca /
GSP33yasasi_u:233: ato na brahmasvarūpaikadeśatā mṛdaṃśateva tatpariṇāmaghaṭāderjagato yuktā /
GSP33yasasi_u:236: yatra viśiṣṭe brahmaṇi samanubhūyamāne 'nyatsvatantraṃ vastu na paśyati,
GSP33yasasi_u:238: sarvaprakārakaḥ sarvātmā paraṃ brahma paramapuruṣo nārāyaṇa eva bhūmā,
GSP33yasasi_u:240: svaniṣṭhaprañcadarśananindayā ca brahmaniṣṭhatvameva tasya gamyata ityāśayena śrutyantaramupādatte udaramiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:241: yadā hyevaiṣa etasminnu daramantaraṃ kurute, atha tasya bhayaṃ bhavatīti taittirīyopaniṣadi /
GSP33yasasi_u:242: etasmin prapañce daramalpamapi antaramantarālaṃ brahmasaṃbandhavicchedaṃ yadā paśyati tadaivāsyaivaṃ jānataḥ saṃsārabhayamupasthitamagre bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:243: paraprakriyācchāyayaivamatrārtho vivakṣito bhedamithyātvaṃ na sidhyatyetadvākyata iti bodhanāya /
GSP33yasasi_u:244: paramātmani niṣṭhāśabditasya dhruvānusmaraṇasya pūrvavākyaprastutasyālpakālavicchede 'pi saṃsārabhayaprasaṅga eveti tu siddhāntisammator'thaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:250_0: nanu virukteṣu vacaneṣu brahmavibhūtitvādau jagataḥ pratipādite 'pi vacanāntareṣu
GSP33yasasi_u:250_1: kāraṇamātrasya satyatvam anyasya sarvasyāsatyatvaṃ ca pratīyate iti tadanurodheneṣāṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:251: vacanāntareṣvapi mithyātvaṃ nocyate bhedaprapañcasya, kintu brahmātmakatvena sattaiveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:254: vācā'sambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyamiti cchāndogye ṣaṣṭhaprapāṭhake /
GSP33yasasi_u:262: kena spṛṣṭamityākāṅkṣāyāṃntvetha yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍeneti pūrvaprakṛto mṛtpiṇḍo yogyatvātkartṛtayānveti /
GSP33yasasi_u:263: ghaṭatvādyavasthārūpo vikāraḥ tattadavasthāyogaprayuktaṃ ghaṭādināma ca mṛtpiṇḍenaiva gṛhītaṃ vākpūrvakavyavahārāyeti phalitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:264: evaṃ kāraṇadravyasyaiva nānāvasthābhāktvena nānākāryātmakatvātkāryāṇāṃ kāraṇānanyatvamityāhamṛttiketyeva satyamiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:270: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñopapādanārthaṃ pravṛttatvādasya vākyasyopādānopādeyayorananyatva eva tātparyamuktadiśā /
GSP33yasasi_u:272: tathā sati sarvasya jñātavyasyābhāvādeva sarvaṃ jñātaṃ syādityasaṅgatamāpadyeta /
GSP33yasasi_u:280: so 'yaṃ śarīrātmabhāvo jagadbrahmaṇoḥsadāyatanāḥ aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvamiti nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:285: tadidameva prāmāṇikamiti cocyate etadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyamityekavākyatayānvayāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:287: paravyākhyācchāyayā tu tadbrahma satyaṃ sadaikarūpamityartho varṇitaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:291: samānaprakaraṇeṣūpādānopādeyayoraikyasyaiva pratipādanācca na kāryasya mithyātvaṃ vācārambhaṇaśruterarthaḥ / kintu kāraṇātmakataiveti pratibodhayannāhaananyaditi /
GSP33yasasi_u:292: pāpakādvyucca ritānāṃ visphuliṅgānāmagnyaṃśatvenāgnyananyatvavadbrahmaṇa udbhūtasya prapañcasyāpi brahmāṃśabhūtasya brahmānanyatvameva vivakṣitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:293: idaṃ cānanyatvaṃ mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiśca śrutiṣu nirūpitamiti yāvat // 30 //
GSP33yasasi_u:303: nanuuta tamādeśamaprākṣyoyenāśrataṃ śrutaṃ bhavatīti pratijñātamekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ brahmaṇa ekasyaiva pāramārthye ghaṭate /
GSP33yasasi_u:306_0: brahmaṇo nikhilajagadantarātmatvena nikhilajagatpradhānatayā nikhilasya ca taccharīratvena
GSP33yasasi_u:306_1: tatprakārataikasvarūpatayā tasmin jñāte tadanantargataṃ kimapi jñātavyaṃ mukhyaṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:306_2: nāvaśiṣyata iti ekavijñānena sarvavijñāvākyasyārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:308: niruktārthaparaiḥ śrutivacanaistanmūlopabṛṃhaṇasmṛtivacanaiśca brahmātmakatvena labdhasvarūpaḥ prapañca ityeva bodhyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:309: na tu brahmaṇo vibhūtibhūtaḥ sa niṣidhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:314: tatra ca ātmano lābhaḥ ātmalābhaḥ-svarūpasattā brahmatmatayā-brahmatmakatvena ātmalābho yasyeti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:315: brahmāvibhūtibhūtasya prapañcasya na niṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ śāstreṣviti nirūpitametāvatā // 32 //33 //
GSP33yasasi_u:319: prapañcaniṣedhe vivakṣite śāstravacanataḥ tattadarthaviśeṣapratipādanopādānādyarthāḥ sarve vyavahārā laukikā vaidikāśca lupyeran-aprāmāṇikā visaṃvādinaśca bhaveyuḥ,
GSP33yasasi_u:322: brahmabhinnasarvamithyātve brahmaviṣayakadhiya aupaniṣadyā apivilopo 'satyatā prasajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:326: nanu paramārthadṛṣṭyā brahmabhinnasya sarvasya mithyātve 'pi tataḥ prāk avidyātaḥ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārādi nirūhyata iti cettatrāhavyāvahāriketi /
GSP33yasasi_u:328: vyāvahārikasattayā pramāṇaprameyavyavahāropapādane vyāvahārikapramāṇabhāvena śrutyādinā janitā parabrahmabuddhirapi bhavatabhimatā vyāvahārikārthamātragocarā bhavet ;
GSP33yasasi_u:331: etadviṣaye pūrvācāryaiḥ sūribhireva parākrāntaṃ nitarāmiti visamyate 'treti bodhyam // 35 //
GSP33yasasi_u:342: nanu sattve prapañcasya nāstīti pratyayaḥ katham /
GSP33yasasi_u:343: asattve vā kathaṃ tasminnastīti pratyayo bhavet // 37 //
GSP33yasasi_u:345: atha tasya sadasadanirvacanīyatvamapi parābhimataṃ nirasituṃ vicāramupakramate nanu sattve iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:346: sattve prapañcasya nāstīti bādhaviṣayatvaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭatetyākṣepo mādhyamikādīnām /
GSP33yasasi_u:348: asattve sadbuddhibodhyatvaṃ pratipannaṃ tasya kathaṃ ghaṭeteti // 37 //
GSP33yasasi_u:362: sadasattvayoḥ pratīyayormadhye ekasyaiva nirṇaye hetvabhāvādyathāpratīti prapañcasyobhayamevaiṣṭavyamiti janā āsthitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:375_1: ca viruddhaṃ dharmadvayaṃ parityajya na sat nāpyasaditi sadasadanirvacaniyaṃ prapañca
GSP33yasasi_u:380: vibhaktadeśakālādiviśeṣataḥ sattvamasattvaṃ ca pratītaṃ vyavasthitaṃ ghaṭāderghaṭata eveti bhāvo 'mīṣām // 42 //
GSP33yasasi_u:387: tatra pakṣāntarāṇāṃ sadoṣatvapratipādanapūrvakaṃ sopādhikasattvāsattvapakṣo mīmāṃsakābhimato nirṇīyate sadyuktyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:400: yadvā pratītiḥ sattvamasattvaṃ ca nirūpādhi yadi pratyapādayiṣyat ,
GSP33yasasi_u:411: tataḥ siddhānte viśeṣaśca śatadūṣaṇyāṃ vyavriyata ṣaṣṭitame vāde śrīmannigamāntācāryacaraṇaiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:416: iha tādātmyaṃ saṃsargo vā sattvamiti vyapadiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:418: ṣaṣṭhe tu pakṣe viruddhadharmayoga eva vastunyasadvyavahārahetutayā vyapadiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:419: ghaṭo hi ghaṭātmanā san paṭātmanā punarasanniti nirdiśyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:425: tathā ayaṃ paṭo nāstītyatra paṭatādātmyābhāvalakṣaṇā paṭātmanāsattā pratīyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:426: tatra tadā ghaṭo nāstītyatra ca taddeśakālasaṃyogābhāvalakṣaṇāsattā pratīyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:429: yathā ghaṭatvameva hi ayaṃ ghaṭo 'stītyatra pratītaṃ ghaṭasya sattvam /
GSP33yasasi_u:431: evaṃ svadeśakālasaṃbandhalakṣaṇā sattaivānyadeśakālanāstitāpratītāvapi viṣayo bhavati deśāntarādisaṃbandhābhāvatveneti /
GSP33yasasi_u:432: tathā ca dharmaviśeṣa eva bhāvānāmastināstipratītigocara iti siddham /
GSP33yasasi_u:439: uktaṃ ca - ādāvante ca yannāsti nāsti madhye 'pi tattathā iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:441: avirodhena sadasattvasamarthanasamahamānaḥ sattvaikāntyavādī kāpilo 'tra pratyavatiṣṭhate nanu deśādīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:446: ataḥ sattvameva sadā mantavyaṃ bhāvānāmitisataḥ sattvaṃ sadā bhavedityantasyārthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:449: asataḥ prayatnaśatenāpi niṣpattyā sattvaṃ durupapādaṃ sikatābhyastailasyeva /
GSP33yasasi_u:473: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ca kārakacakrasya tasya tasya tatra tatra kārye sāmarthyaniyamaḥ sidhyatīti nātiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:485: tacca pratītibādhābhyāṃ sadasadvilakṣaṇatvasiddheḥ supratiṣṭhitamiti hi māyāvādināṃ matam /
GSP33yasasi_u:490: nirviśeṣacinmātrabrahmātmaikyaṃ catattvamasivākyapratipannamiti vādamadvaitināṃ pratikṣeptuṃ tattvamasivākyārthavicāramupakramate śvetaketumiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:494: asyāpi samānādhikaraṇavākyasya mukhyārthatvaṃ tanmate na saṃbhavatītyahatasyetyādinā // 51 //
GSP33yasasi_u:502: samānavibhaktyā pratipannamaikyaṃ jīveśvarayorviruddhasvabhāvayorna ghaṭata iti mukhyārthāsaṃbhava evetyāśayaḥ // 52 //
GSP33yasasi_u:513: nanvajñatvādi sarvajñatvādi copalakṣaṇatayaivocyate, na tu viśeṣaṇatayā /
GSP33yasasi_u:517: upalakṣaṇatve 'pi ajñatvādinopalakṣyasya jīvabhāvasya sarvajñatvādinopalakṣyasyeśvarabhāvasya ca vaiyadhikaraṇyādeva tvantadarthayoraikyaṃ na sidhyatītyarthaḥ // 54 //
GSP33yasasi_u:522: yathā so 'yaṃ raurityatra tattedantopalakṣite vastumātre lakṣaṇā padadvayasya tatheti śaṅkate vācyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:523: vācyaikadeśasya pravṛttinimittabhedasya tyāgena viśeṣyamātre cinmātre padadvayasya vṛttiḥ jahadajahallakṣaṇayeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:532: tattāviśiṣṭe idantānvayasya bādhe 'pi ekasmin dharmiṇyubhayānvaye na virodhaḥ / deśadvayasaṃbandhaḥ paricchinnasya vastunaḥ kālabhedātparihriyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:534: prātipadikābhyāṃ deśadvayakāladvayasaṃbandhasya samānavibhaktyā tadāśrayadravyaikyasya ca pratipādane na virodhaleśo 'pi /
GSP33yasasi_u:539: na tvevaṃ bhavatā vaktuṃ śakyata ityāhasvaprakāśasyeti /
GSP33yasasi_u:540: nirviśeṣe cinmātre viruddhadharmadvayasambandhasyāvirodhopapādakaṃ deśakālāvasthābhedādau kiñcidapi na ghaṭate /
GSP33yasasi_u:544: brahmaṇyavidyānvayāyogādevāvidyākṛtabhedadarśananirasanārthatvaṃ śāstrasya nirviśeṣacinmātra brahmātmaikyaviṣayatvaṃ ca parābhimataṃ na saṃbhavītyāhanirdhūteti /
GSP33yasasi_u:547: na ca nirviśeṣe svaprakāśe ca tatprasaktiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:553: mā ... pare ( māyopādhau pare )'dhyastāḥ śokamohadayaḥ punaḥ // 59 //
GSP33yasasi_u:556: cinmātre brahmaṇyavidyānvayānupapattiparyālocanayā kaiścidadvaitibhiḥ kalpitaṃ māyāvidyopādhibhedaṃ tata eveśeśitavyabhedaṃ cāparamārthamupapādyamānaṃ nirasyatieteneti /
GSP33yasasi_u:560: tattvamasivākyajanyaikyasākṣātkāreṇa māyāvidyopādhināśe tatkalpita īśajīvabhāvo 'pi nivṛtto nāvatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:566: aikyajñānena nivṛttyupagame 'pi tasya kṣaṇikatvādeva punarapi brahmasvarūpabalāttayoḥ kalpanāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:567: kiñca māyāyā bhrāntijanakatve duḥkhādijanakatve cāvidyāto vibhāgāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:570: avidyāyā eva bahusaṃmatatvānmāyāvidyopādhibhedavādino 'mī kṣudrā brahmavido 'dvaitiṣviti ca bodhyam // 59 //60 //
GSP33yasasi_u:579: niraṃśe cinmātre māyāvidyāsambandhe tatprayuktasvabhāvabhedā ekasminneva prasajyante iti jīveśvarasvabhāvasāṅkaryaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:581: māyāvidyā ceti cedātmāśrayaḥ, jīvatveśvaratve iti cedanyonyāśrayaḥ, anyattu viśeṣaṇaṃ durvacameva /
GSP33yasasi_u:582: kiñca māyayāvidyayā vā saṃvitsvarūpasya cchedāsambhavādekameva tattadupahitaṃ bhavedgaganamiva maṭhāntavartighaṭena maṭhena copahitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:583: tathā ca hastapādādyavacchinnasukhaduḥkhabhoga ekasyaiva yathā jīvasya,
GSP33yasasi_u:584: tathā tattadupādhiprayuktaiśvaryaduḥkhādibhoga ekasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ prasajyata iti jīvaparasvabhāvāvyavasthitirevetyarthaḥ // 61 //62 //
GSP33yasasi_u:585: taṭasthāvasthitā dharmāḥ svarūpaṃ na spṛśanti kim /
GSP33yasasi_u:589_0: tanniṣṭhasya sārvajñyāderajñatvādeśca daṇḍena kuṇḍalena vopahite kādācitkadaṇḍādiviśeṣaṇavattayā
GSP33yasasi_u:589_1: taṭasthaśabdite devadatte vartamānasya sukhasya duḥkhasya ca devadattātmanīva brahmaṇi
GSP33yasasi_u:603: brahmabhinnasyānātmatve tattvaṃpadadvayalakṣyārtha eka pratyaktatvaṃ cinmātramava śiṣyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:606: taccaekaśeṣe tu tādātmyaṃ cinmātre naiva sambhavet iti syāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:612: atra yādavaprakāśaprakriyayā bhāṭṭaprakriyayā vā nirūpyate tādātmyamiti bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:614: dharmadvārakabhedaviśiṣṭasvarūpābheda eva ca tādātmyaṃ matamiti vivekaḥ // 65 //
GSP33yasasi_u:624: antye ghaṭo ghaṭa itīti vā bhedābhedavikalpo bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:626: atyantabhinnasyātyantābhinnasya vā bandhe - tādātmyasambandhe asati-aprāmāṇike sati bhavatkṛto 'yaṃ vikalpo 'pārtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:627: na hi ghaṭo ghaṭa iti vā ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yasasi_u:631: na ca bhede tayorvirodhādekatra samāveśo na ghaṭata iti vācyam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:633: dharmato bhedaḥ svarūpato 'bheda iti vāvirodha iti bhāvaḥ // 66 //
GSP33yasasi_u:641: etayoḥ-bhedābhedayoḥ svarūpaṃ svarūpabhedamupagamyaiva bhedo 'bhedo veti vikalpakoṭyorbādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ kriyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:651: antye asambaddhasya viśiṣṭabuddhinirvāhakatvaṃ tasya na syāditi vikalpanamapi kaṇṭhaśoṣaṇamātraphalakaṃ pratyakṣānubhavabādhitaṃ cetyarthaḥ // 69 //
GSP33yasasi_u:655: nīlarūpavati ghaṭādau nīlabuddhiryathā nīlasamavāyāvagāhinī viditā nāpalapyā,
GSP33yasasi_u:669: sphuṭapratipanne saṃyoge dustarkatanmūlavikalpanādi yathā bhramalakṣaṇaṃ kaṇṭhaśoṣaṇamātram ,
GSP33yasasi_u:671: evaṃ nīlotpalāditādātmye pratyakṣe jīvabrahmatādātmye ca śāstrasiddhe dustarkavikalpanādi pratyakṣaśāstradaṇḍanivāritamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:676: pravṛttinimittarūpadharmabhedena dharmisvarūpābhedena ca tādātmyaṃ tattvamasītyādau tvamādiśabdānāṃ tattaccharīrakabrahmaparyantatayā nirūpaṇīyam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:681: ekaśeṣe hi ciddhātoḥ kasya mokṣaḥ phalaṃ bhavet // 74 //
GSP33yasasi_u:683: etāvatā paramate prātipadikayoriva samānavibhakterapi na mukhyārthateti vyavasthāpitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:685: tathāpi pravṛttinimittadharmabhedaprahāṇānna sāmānādhikaraṇyamukhyārthatā paramata iti bodhyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:688: eṣa brahma praviṣṭo 'smi grīṣme śītamiva hradam itivacanānusāreṇa brahmānandasya hradatvarūpaṇam ,
GSP33yasasi_u:690: brahmānandaṃ hṛdantaḥstha iti pūrvamudritapāṭhastu na samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:692: paramaphale mokṣe bhoktṛtvāvasthāpannasya svasya vilayaṃ cejjānīyānnābhilaṣyettāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:693: ekaśeṣe-nirviśeṣacinmā trapariśeṣe, kasya-brahmaṇo jīvasya vā mokṣaḥ phalam ?
GSP33yasasi_u:694: na brahmaṇaḥ, nityamuktatvāt , nāpi jīvasya, tasyaiva tadā vilayāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:695: cinmātrameva brahma jīvasya svarūpamiti cettarhi brahmaṇa evāvidyājīvabhāvādi vaktavyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:700: na hi tasyāmajātāyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ vākhilaṃ jagat /
GSP33yasasi_u:710: paṭajñānanāśe 'pi anyeṣāṃ ghaṭādibhedānāmupalambhānna paṭajñānāderapi prapañcādhyāsādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:714: ghaṭādayo hi bhidyante na tu sā cit prakāśanāt // 77 //
GSP33yasasi_u:716: naivaṃ, ghaṭo hi nābhāti sā sphuratyeva tu sphuṭam // 78 //
GSP33yasasi_u:726: ghaṭabuddhiḥ paṭajñānakāle na bhāsate, kintu paṭadhīreveti cet , maivam /
GSP33yasasi_u:733: tasyātiriktatve tu paṭajñāne tadabhāne 'pi saṃvidobhānamakṣatameveti samuditāśayaḥ // 77 //78 //79 //
GSP33yasasi_u:734: kiñcāsyāḥ svaprakāśāyā nīrūpāyā na hi svataḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:743: saṃvinna nānā svaprakāśatvāt , yannānā tadasvaprakāśaṃ yathā ghaṭādīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:746: na vastu vastudharmo vā na pratyakṣo na laiṅgikaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:757: evaṃ ghaṭasya paṭabhedo dharmaḥ, paṭabhedabhedo 'pi tathā, evaṃ tadbhedo 'pīti cānavasthāprasakteḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:762: pratyakṣeṇa bhedagrahaṇābhāvādeva tanmūlāvinābhāvagrahādhīnodayamanumānamapi na bhede pramāṇaṃ bhavediti hṛdayam /
GSP33yasasi_u:763: nanu tarhi bhedagrahaḥ katham ? tatrāhakevalaṃ bhramalakṣaṇa iti // 81 //
GSP33yasasi_u:772: kiñca svayaṃprakāśasya svato vā parato 'pi vā /
GSP33yasasi_u:778: saṃvidaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvo vā kiṃ tayaiva gṛhyate ?
GSP33yasasi_u:779: uta saṃvidantareṇeti vikalpya prathamaṃ kalpa pratikṣipatisvata iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:780: svena satā svābhāvo gṛhyata ? utāsatā ? ādyandūṣayatisvasminniti /
GSP33yasasi_u:786: saṃvinnānātvopagame 'pi na tatprāgabhāvagrahasambhava ityabhyupagamya vādaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:800: so 'yaṃ saṃvidbhedāvalambī vikalpādivādaḥ saṃvitsvarūpayāthātmyājñānakārya ityadvaitino manyanta ityarthaḥ // 86 //
GSP33yasasi_u:805: śraddhāmātraśaraṇeṣu vineyabuddhiṣu nirūpaṇāsamartheṣu bhavadabhimato 'yaṃ brahmopadeśaḥ śobhate nāma /
GSP33yasasi_u:806: yuktivimarśakā vayaṃ tu nātra bhavadīye brahmopadeśe śraddhālavaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:807: ato 'smān rañjayituṃ satpramāṇatarkā evopādeyāḥ, na tu śuṣkopadeśā iti bhāvaḥ // 87 //
GSP33yasasi_u:813: ekasminneva viṣaye kālabhedena karaṇabhedena ca dhiyo nānā pratyātmamadhyakṣasiddhāḥ sukhaduḥkhādivadityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:817: na hi bhedaḥ svato nāsti nāpratyakṣaśca sammataḥ // 89 //
GSP33yasasi_u:818: nanu yathā nirbhede 'pyākāśe sambandhivyaṅgyo bhedo ghaṭākāśo 'yamayaṃ tu maṭhākāśa iti pratīyate,
GSP33yasasi_u:819: evaṃ saṃvidyapi viṣayāśrayavyaṅgyo bhedo na vāstava iti cettatrāhasambandhīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:821: sa tu kuḍyamusalasaṃyoga iti sambandhibhedenaiva vyāvṛttatayā pratīyamānaḥ saṃyogabhedo vāstava eva sambandhijanyatvāttasya,
GSP33yasasi_u:823: maitrasya paṭecchetyevaṃ sambandhibhedena bhinnatayā pratīyamānā bhinnabhinnaivecchā tattatpuruṣīyā tadā tadā jāyamānā,
GSP33yasasi_u:824: evaṃ viṣayāśrayabhedena pratīyamīnaḥ saṃvidbhedo 'pi vāstavika eva kālādibhedena jāyamāna iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:825: siddhānte tattatpuruṣe vartamānasya dharmabhutajñānasyaikatve nityatve 'pi tattadarthaprakāśanārthaprasaraṇāvasthābhedaviśiṣṭaveṣeṇa nānātvamanityatvaṃ ca saṃmataṃ,
GSP33yasasi_u:828: tataḥ sarvaṃ sadā bhāyāt , na vā kiñcitkadācana // 90 //
GSP33yasasi_u:830: nityavibhunaḥ prakāśakasyaikasya jñānasya sarvaviṣayasambandhe samāne sadā sarvārthasya bhānaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:831: prakāśakajñānasambandhe 'pyabhāne tu kasyacidapi kadāpi bhānaṃ na syāt /
GSP33yasasi_u:839: siddhānte tu saṅkocavikāsābhyāṃ jñānasya viṣayabhede sannidhyasannidhī vyavasthite iti bodhyam // 91 //
GSP33yasasi_u:842: etatkaraṇajanyaṃ jñānametamevārthaṃ gṛhṇātītyevaṃ karaṇabhedenāpi vyavasthā durvacā bhavadbhirityāhanāpīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:849_1: eva caitanyaṃ taṃ tamarthaṃ prakāśayatīti vyavasthā ghaṭata iti cet ;
GSP33yasasi_u:855: nanu naḥ saṃvido bhinnaṃ sarvaṃ nāma na kiñcana /
GSP33yasasi_u:857: sarvasya sarvadā bhānaprasaṅgaṃ siddhāntinodbhāvitamākṣipati paraḥnanu iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:858: saṃvidbhinnasya sarvasya virahādevāsmanmate sarvaṃ sadā bhāyāditya sthānaṃ'nuyogo bhavatāmityarthaḥ // 94 //
GSP33yasasi_u:859: idamākhyāhi bhoḥ kiṃ nu nīlādirna prakāśate /
GSP33yasasi_u:860: prakāśamāno nīlādiḥ saṃvido vā na bhidyate // 95 //
GSP33yasasi_u:863: uta nīlādeḥ saṃvidabhinnatvena tatpratītiḥ saṃvitpratītirevābhimanyata ityarthaḥ // 95 //
GSP33yasasi_u:867: nānāpratītinihnive nānāpadapadārthapratītinirvāhyaḥ sarvo laukiko vaidikaśca vyavahāraḥ pratītisubhagaḥ-abādhitānubhavasiddhaḥ samyaṅ nirvyūḍho bhavedbhavadbhirityupālambhaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:879: bhinnatvenābhinnatvena vā nirūpayitumaśakyatvaṃ ca tasyā avidyāvilāsatvāt bhedābhedayoranirūpaṇaṃ yasyā bhedābhedānirūpaṇā /
GSP33yasasi_u:880: āvidyāsya nīlādibhedasya mithyātvāt mithyārthe ca durghaṭatvasya bhūṣaṇatvādbhedābhedānirūpaṇopapattiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:881: upapattyananuvartitvādeva ca sarvaṃ sadā bhāyādityādyāpatterapyanavakāśa iti hṛdayam /
GSP33yasasi_u:885: avidyā hi nyāyānalaspṛṣṭā jātuṣavanna jīvituṃ prabhavati /
GSP33yasasi_u:893: atra vikalpaḥ-kiṃ vidyābhāvo 'vidyā, uta vidyābhinnaṃ bhāvāntaramiti /
GSP33yasasi_u:896: tathā ca svayamevālabdhasattāvidyā kathaṃ prapañcavyavasthāpikā bhavedityākūtam /
GSP33yasasi_u:902: arthānarthāntaratvādivikalpo 'syā na yujyataiti vacanaṃvidyātor'thāntaramasāviti ca vacanaṃ mitho viruddhamiti yāvat // 99 //100 //
GSP33yasasi_u:907: kiñca śuddhājaḍā saṃvit , avidyeyaṃ tu nedṛśī /
GSP33yasasi_u:910: tathā ca śuddhājaḍasaṃvidapekṣayā vikārāspadāśuddhajaḍāvidyāyā bheda eva paramārthataḥ kuto na nirūpyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:911: tathā ca paramārthāvidyāvilāso bhedaḥ sarvo 'pi saṃvida ekasyā eva sakalārthaprakāśakatve sarvadā bhāseteti doṣastadavastha iti bhāvaḥ // 102 //
GSP33yasasi_u:913: sā vidyā kiṃ nu saṃvittirvedyaṃ vā veditāthavā // 103 //
GSP33yasasi_u:916: tatra pratiyogibhūtā vidyā kiṃrūpeti vikalpanaṃ vimarśanārtham // 103 //
GSP33yasasi_u:920: tatra vidyāyā vedyarūpatve veditṛsvarūpatve vā doṣamāhavedyatve iti /
GSP33yasasi_u:925: kiñceyaṃ tadviruddhā vā, na tasyāḥ kvāpi sambhavaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:928: divākarakaravyāpte deśe divākare vā tadvirodhino 'ndhatamasasyeva vibhvyā saṃvidā vyāpte sarvatra saṃvidi vā nāvidyāyāḥ samāveśasambhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:936: avidyāyā aparamārthatvena tadanāditve 'pi nāsmadabhimatādvaitoparodha iti cedatra bramaḥ-anāditvenopagamyamānāyā avidyāyāḥ kalpakadoṣāntarāyogenāpāramārthyāyogaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:937: brahmaṇa eva tatkalpakadoṣatve durghaṭatvena hetvantarānapekṣatve vā muktāvapi tatprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:940: kiñcāsau kasya ? jīvasya, ko jīvo yasya seti cet /
GSP33yasasi_u:942: na te jīvādavidyā syāt , na ca jīvastayā vinā /
GSP33yasasi_u:945: na vidyate samādhānaṃ yasya tadasamādhānam - asamādheyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:947: tasmin siddha evāvidyāsiddhiriti jīvāvidyāpakṣe paramate 'nyonyāśrayo 'samādheyaḥ prasajatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:949: kintu bhavatāmeveti dyotyate te iti nirdeśena /
GSP33yasasi_u:952: bījāṅkura nyāyena sa doṣaḥ parihārya ityatrāhane ti /
GSP33yasasi_u:956: brahmaṇaścenna sarvajñaṃ kathaṃ tat baṃbhramīti te(bhoḥ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:961: sarvaṃ sarvadā sarvathā yathāvasthitaṃ svataḥ sākṣātkurvatastasya nānāvidhabhrāntilakṣaṇāvidyāśrayatvaṃ viruddhatvānna sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:962: brahma bambhramītīti te 'bhimataṃ kathaṃ ghaṭate ? tasya sarvajñatvena bhramāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:966: avidyāmūlāhaṅkāranibandhanatā ca brahmaniṣṭhasya sārvajñyasya na ghaṭate,
GSP33yasasi_u:967: parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ceti tasyānanyopādhikatvaśravaṇādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:983: te śabdāntarādayaḥ śāstrabhedakāḥ-tattadvidhivākyasya vibhinnavibhinnavidheyakatvena bhedavyavasthāpakāḥ bhedakapramāṇabhūtāstāntrikairmatāḥ,
GSP33yasasi_u:985: tathā sarvajñatāpi pāramārthikārthabhedagocarā yathārthaiva kiṃ na syādityarthaḥ // 111 //
GSP33yasasi_u:988: parabrahmaṇi parameśvare svataḥ sarvajñe 'vidyāyā asambhava uktaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:990_1: vindeta padaṃ gabhastimālinīvāndhatamasaṃ tarhi na tasyā nivartakamanyatkiñcidapi
GSP33yasasi_u:999: tathā cāmananti sma parāśarabhaṭṭapādāḥetadrāmāstraṃ dalayatu kalibrahmamīmāṃsakāṃśca jñaptirbrahmaitajjavaladapi nijāvidyayā bambhramīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1000: tasya bhrāntiṃ tāṃ ślathayati jitādvaitavidyastu jīvo yadyaddṛśyaṃ tadvitathamiti ye jñāpayāñcakrurajñāḥ //
GSP33yasasi_u:1004: nanu bhedakapramāṇānāṃ sarvajñatvādivacanānāmapi vyāvahārikārthabhedagocarāṇāṃ vyāvahārikameva pramāṇyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1007: tatra jīveśvarādibhedo 'pyavidyayā vinānupapanna iti brahmāśritaiva sānāyatyā mantavyeti śaṅkate sarvajñatvādīti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1012: sāmānādhikaraṇyaśrutīnāṃ ca sarvaśarīrakasarvātmabhūtabrahmaikyaparatvamiti na jīvabhāvādikalpikāvidyā brahmaṇyupagantavyeti ca hārdam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1023: saditi sattāmātramekarasaṃ svaprakāśarūpaṃ brahma kathaṃ svaviṣayakāvidyāyatanaṃ bhavedākārabhedābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1026: brahmatvena viṣaya iti cedayaṃ rūpabhedaḥ kathamāyātastatra ?
GSP33yasasi_u:1028: svābhāviko 'yamiti tu na vaktuṃ śakyate saviśeṣatvabhiyā parairiti bhāvaḥ jīvāvidyāpakṣa ivātrāpyanyonyāśra iti punarityanena dyotyate // 114 //115 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1046: kiñcāvidyā na cet ... (vastu vyavahāryaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:1047: nāpyavastviti co....... (ktau tu vastutvaṃ sidhyati dhruvam ) /
GSP33yasasi_u:1050: ato na vastu nā... (vastu na sadvācyaṃ na cāpyasat ) /

GSP33yasasi_u:1553: tathā cāsadvyāvṛttaṃ sadantaravyāvṛttaṃ ca vastunaḥ santaṃ ghaṭādikameva pratipādayanti pratītayaḥ ghaṭo 'sti ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1556: nanvastīti yaduktaṃ kiṃ tanmātraṃ ghaṭa ityapi /
GSP33yasasi_u:1561: stor'thāntaraṃ cettena bodhyate tarhi ghaṭāderāpatitaṃ sadasada nirvācya tvam pratītibalāccāsadvyāvṛttiriti bhāvaḥ // 188 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1565: asti brahme tyupaniṣatpratipādyamapi brahmatulyanayātsadasadanirvacanīyaṃ prasajyate ityarthaḥ // 189 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1580: tasya sarvasya tathā - tvadupadarśitarītyā tatprakārarāhityaṃ prasajyatā ityarthaḥ // 191 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1584: tatra ghaṭāderbhedasyāropitatvaṃ ca parābhimataṃ pratikṣipanniva svābhimatārthaṃ pratipādayati tasmāditi /
GSP33yasasi_u:1587: svaiḥsvairvyavasthitai rūpaiḥ padārthānāṃ tu yā sthitiḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1588: sā sattā na svatantra'nyā tatrādvaitakathā katham // 193 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1590: vijātīya sajātīyāntaravyāvartakena svasvāsādhāraṇākāreṇa tasya tasya padārthasya yā sthitiḥ - kālasambandhaḥ pramāṇasambandho vā ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1592: sā ca pratipadārthaṃ vyavasthitā , dhātvarthatvātkartṛparatantrā ca /
GSP33yasasi_u:1593: tatsattāyāṃ svatantratvamadvaitaṃ ca bhavadabhimataṃ naiva yuktamiti bhāvaḥ // 193 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1596: tenāpi sādhitaṃ kiñcit saṃvido 'sti na vā tvayā /
GSP33yasasi_u:1597: asti cet pakṣapātaḥ syāt na cette viphalaḥ śramaḥ // 195 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1598: evaṃ prameyabhūtasannānātvaṃ vyavasthāpya pramitinānātvamapi vyavasthāpayati parābhimatacidadvaitanirāsena naceti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1599: viṣayāśrayaviśeṣaiḥ pratyakṣādisvagataviśeṣaiścānubhūyamānaṃ saṃvinnānātvamapi na kṣeptuṃ śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1600: atra paraiḥ saṃvido nirviśeṣatve proktamanumānamanūdya pratikṣipati na vedya miti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1601: saṃvidi nirviśeṣatvarūpaḥ sādhyadharma upagamyate na vā ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1602: upagamyate cennirnimitta ekasmin dharme pakṣapātaste prasajyate - eko dharma upadamyate ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1613: svarasto viṣayāśrayasvagataviśeṣairviśiṣṭā vilakṣaṇatvena sphuṭaṃ pratīyamānāḥ saṃvidaḥ yathāvasthitairvabāhyair ghaṭādibhirarthairnaikyaṃ yāntītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1618: etacchlokasyottarārdhaṃ na cāsti citisāmānyaṃ sarvasaṃvedanāspada miti vā na cidasti sasāmānyaṃ sarvasaṃvedanāspada miti vā sambhāvyate /
GSP33yasasi_u:1622: viśeṣeṇa sahopalambhasya vyabhicāre 'pi citsāmānyena sahopalambhaniyamo 'stīti cet ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1625: yathāmudritapāṭhe tvayamarthaḥ - sahopalambhaniyamo na siddhayati cet sarvaṃ sasāmānyaviseṣaṃ jñātṛjñeyātmakaṃ jñeyajātaṃ jñānabhinnatayāstyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1627: ayaṃ ślokaḥ sahopalambhaniyamā dityādinā prapañca sphuṭamañcatī tyantena anūdyamānaparapakṣa pratikṣepabhāge susaṅgataḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1629: ayaṃ ca śloko jñeyajñātroḥ saṃvidaikyasādha kasahopalambhaniyamarūpahetorasiddhipratipādaka iti dhyeyam // 197 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1638: arthaprakāśe niyamena saṃvido bhānāsiddhyarthaṃ tasyāḥ svaprakāśatvamāha yadetaditi /
GSP33yasasi_u:1639: svayamprakāśatāpravṛttinimittakaḥ śabdo yasya tat svayaṃprakāśatāśabdaṃ svayaṃprakāśaśabdavācyam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1642: saṃvitprakāśābhāver'thasyāpi na prakāśa iti saṃvitprakāśābhāvavyāpakābhāvapratiyogiprakāśasyārthasya saṃvidananyatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33yasasi_u:1653: evaṃ jñātṛjñeyalakṣaṇārthān mā sma paribhavaḥ, na pratikṣiperityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1654: pratikṣepeṣāṃ kuto na ghaṭate ? tatrāha pratyakṣeṇe , ti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1655: balavattarapratyakṣapramāṇasaṃrakṣyamāṇā ete na tvadīyasaṃvidaikyānumānānuvartino jñātṛjñeyabhedā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1657: artheṣu saṃvidaikyasādhanārthaṃ hi arthānāṃ saṃvidaśca svarūpagrahaṇaṃ tāvadapekṣitam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1658: tata eva ca mithasteṣāṃ bhedo 'pi siddha iti pratyakṣabādhitamanumānaṃ na pravartata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1659: atra jvālābhedānumānavaiṣamyaprakāro vivṛta ātmasiddhau , tata evānusandheyaḥ // 201 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1664: atra śrīparaśarabhaṭṭāryaśrīsūktiranusandheyā ahamidamabhivedmītyātmabittyorvibhede sphurati yadi tadaikyaṃ bāhyamapyekamastu /
GSP33yasasi_u:1665: pramitirapi mṛṣā syātanmeyamithyātvavāde yadi tadapi saheran dīrdhamasmanmatāyuḥ iti // 202 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1670: vahneranuṣṇatvānumānamiva pratyakṣabādhitamarthajñātroḥ saṃvidaikyānumānaṃ bhavadīyamiti proktaṃ bhavati // 203 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1672: tavāpi na hi saṃvittiḥ svātmanā saha bhāsate // 204 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1673: kañci sāhityaṃ bhedaniyataṃ jñānārthayorhetughaṭakaṃ tadabhedasādhane viruddhamityāha kiñce ti /
GSP33yasasi_u:1674: saṃvitsaṃvidā sahopalabhyata iti hi tavāpi na sammatam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1675: tatsaṃvidā tatsaṃvidā sahopalabhyamānamarthajātaṃ niyamena tadbhinnameva bhavediti yāvat // 204 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1686_0: arthaṃ vinā saṃvido bhāne tāṃ vinār'thasyāpi bhānaṃ siddhiprāyamiti sahopalambhanirūpabhavaduktahetvasiddhiriti
GSP33yasasi_u:1687: yasmādṛte yadābhāti bhāti ya(ta) smādṛte 'pi tat /
GSP33yasasi_u:1695: ghaṭādṛte bhātātatpaṭādṛte bhānaṃ ghaṭasya yathā sidhyati ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1696: tathār'thaṃ vinābhātājjñānādvinā bhānasarthasya sidhyatīti sahopalambhaniyamo nanīladitaddhiyāṃ sidhyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yasasi_u:1697_0: nanu jñānenaivārthaprakāśasya vācyatvājjñānasya ca svaprakāśatvājjñānabhānaṃ vinārṃ'thabhānaṃ
GSP33yasasi_u:1697_1: na yujyata iti cedevamapi sahopalambhaniyamo na yujyata eva jñānaviśeṣeṇa jñānasāmānyena vā ,
GSP33yasasi_u:1699: idamartha eva sahopalambhaniyama iti 197 tamaḥ ślokaḥ , sa cātrānusandheya iti prāgevoktam /
GSP33yasasi_u:1700: evaṃ mitimātṛmeyabhidāyāthātmyaṃ na nihnotuṃ śakyata iti vyavasthāpi tamatreti dhyeyam // 207 //
GSP33yasasi_u:1704: prajñānidhirguruvaro mama bhūtapuryāṃ rāmānujārya urukīrtīrayaṃ samindhe //
GSP33yasasi_u:1706: aṇṇaṅgarārya iti ca prathitābhidhāno vyākhyābhimāmakaravaṃ prativādibhīkṛta gurupādaprasādena yāmunoktyarṇave tariḥ /
